items.title: State Democratic parties use DNC chair race to pitch redistribution of power, money
items.description: State party leaders want to return to a more robust 50-state strategy with less centralized control by elected Washington leaders.

items.title: Under Biden, a generational shift in U.S. views of Israel
items.description: Support for Israel was once widespread across the American political spectrum. Biden’s presidency has widened a deepening rift among Democrats.

items.title: Biden commutes most federal death sentences before Trump takes office

items.title: Trump returns to rally stage before friendly crowd in Arizona
items.description: The president-elect addressed a youth-focused conference of Turning Point USA, jumping from Cabinet picks to Elon Musk to Panama Canal fees.
